message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed deal. I'll take the bigger share, but you get a decent chunk. Hope you'll accept!
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money, after all.

Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable here. I'm taking a hit due to inflation, so I'll need a bit more than your last offer. This is a fair split, considering the changing value of our money. Let's finish this!
